translation:
List of what was taken from the rebels and brought to this Arsenal, namely:

- Bronze pieces of calibre 9  
- Said said of 6  
- Campaign forge  
- Armaments  
- Campaign repairs  
- Sockets with wool  
- Spoons with scrapers  
- Rudders with tips

This is what I must list because it is all that I found. War Arsenal, December 26, 1840. The Storekeeper Firmino Lu√≠s Gomes de Abreu
